titleStmt.title: A letter to the Earle of Pembrooke concerning the times, and the sad condition both of Prince and people.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Howell by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: faded, with print show-through and slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
